title: Macroalgae-based biochar: preparation and characterization of physicochemical properties for potential applications
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1828-1836

Anjon Kumar Mondal, Cora Hinkley, Lakshmi Krishnan, Nandhini Ravi, Farjana Akter, Peter Ralph, Unnikrishnan Kuzhiumparambil
In this study, we selected five macroalgae species and employed a pyrolysis technique to convert biomass into biochar.
